title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Understand cloud infrastructure and deploy services on AWS.

chapters.title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
chapters.description: Get an overview of cloud computing and its benefits.

lessons.title: Types of Cloud Services (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS)

chapters.title: Getting Started with AWS
chapters.description: Create an AWS account and explore the AWS Management Console.

chapters.title: AWS Core Services
chapters.description: Learn about essential AWS services and how to use them.

chapters.title: Networking with AWS
chapters.description: Understand AWS networking and create virtual private networks.

lessons.title: Managing Security Groups and Network ACLs

chapters.title: Deploying Applications on AWS
chapters.description: Learn to deploy web applications on AWS infrastructure.

lessons.title: Using Elastic Beanstalk for Simple Deployments
Scaling with Load Balancers and Auto-Scaling Groups

chapters.title: Database Management on AWS
chapters.description: Explore AWS database services and management strategies.

chapters.title: Security and Identity Management
chapters.description: Learn how to secure AWS resources and manage identities.

chapters.title: Monitoring and Logging
chapters.description: Monitor resources and log events for troubleshooting.

chapters.title: Serverless Architecture on AWS
chapters.description: Learn to build applications without managing servers.

lessons.title: Creating Serverless APIs with API Gateway

chapters.title: Project: Deploy a Fullstack Application
chapters.description: Apply your knowledge by deploying a fullstack application.

prerequisites: Basic understanding of software development and web applications.
learningOutcomes: Understand the fundamentals of cloud computing and AWS services.
Set up virtual servers, databases, and networks on AWS.
Deploy and manage applications using AWS infrastructure.
Implement security, monitoring, and logging in cloud environments.
Build serverless applications and deploy fullstack solutions on AWS.
